titles.title: Relating to the consideration of House Report 117-216 and an accompanying resolution.
Relating to the consideration of House Report 117-216 and an accompanying resolution.
Relating to the consideration of House Report 117â€“216 and an accompanying resolution.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 848.
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 117-217, by Mr. Raskin.
Providing for consideration relating to a resolution to accompany House Report 117-216.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 57.

action.text: DEBATE - The House continued with further debate on H. Res. 848.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate on H. Res. 848, the Chair put the question on ordering the previous question and by voice vote announced that the noes had prevailed. Mr. Raskin demanded the yeas and nays and the Chair postponed further proceedings on ordering the previous question until a time to be announced.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 218 - 209 (Roll no. 441).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 220 - 210 (Roll no. 442).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution provides for the consideration of a report from the Select Committee to Investigate the January 6th Attack on the United States Capitol that recommends Mark Meadows be cited for contempt of Congress.
